# Events Docs

## Events

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/index.md): Learn about events. Events enable a class or object to notify other classes or objects when something of interest occurs.
- [How to subscribe to and unsubscribe from events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/how-to-subscribe-to-and-unsubscribe-from-events.md): Learn how to subscribe to and unsubscribe from events. Subscribe to events using the Visual Studio IDE, programmatically, or using an anonymous method.
- [How to raise base class events in derived classes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/how-to-raise-base-class-events-in-derived-classes.md): Learn how to raise base class events in derived classes. See a code example and view additional available resources.
- [How to implement interface events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/how-to-implement-interface-events.md): Learn how to implement interface events in a class. See code examples and view additional available resources.
- [How to implement custom event accessors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/events/how-to-implement-custom-event-accessors.md): Learn how to implement custom event accessors. See a code example and view additional available resources.
